textBox.richText: ll are welcome to come join in the fun of an exploitation double feature complete with action, sleaze, and badasses! The two films being screened back to back will be “The Street Fighter” (1974) starring Sonny Chiba as a man on a mission to kick ass and Jack Hill’s “Switchblade Sisters” (1975) featuring hot blondes in hot pants! Both films will be projected on the big screen along with some choice exploitation movie trailers also from the 70s. See the links below for more information on each film... The Street Fighter (1974) Switchblade Sisters (1975)
